entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
